Introduction

WALWARI (Korean: 왈와리; Japanese: ワルワリ) was a Korean pop mixed group that debuted in 2017. Their last line-up consisted of three members: Mr. Boombox, J’yunky and Suhyun. They debuted on January 12, 2017 under Noori Entertainment, then HIstar Entertainment. Their last known activity was in early 2020, meaning that they most likely disbanded.
